name: tram-lite
description: ðŸ’¡ HTML library for building and enhancing web-components

scripts.build: npm run bundle && npm run set && npm run minify
scripts.bundle: uglifyjs src/TramLite.js src/processors/*.js -o output/bundle-step.js --define APP_VERSION="'4.1.1'" -b --comments all
scripts.set: npm run set:api && npm run set:tram-lite && npm run set:import-component
scripts.set:api: uglifyjs output/bundle-step.js -o output/api.js --define MODULE="true" --define INSTALL="false" -b --comments all
scripts.set:tram-lite: uglifyjs output/bundle-step.js -o output/tram-lite.js --define MODULE="false" --define INSTALL="true" -b --comments all
scripts.set:import-component: uglifyjs output/bundle-step.js src/import-component.js -o output/import-component.js --define MODULE="false" --define INSTALL="false"  -b --comments all -e
scripts.minify: npm run minify:api && npm run minify:tram-lite && npm run minify:import-component
